product.summary: A high performance graph store with all the features expected of a mature and robust database

overview.overview: Built to be fault-tolerant, on a distributed graph database, that gives developers the tools to rapidly build and model applications at scale

childMarkdownRemark.html:
• GraphQL Native
  • Any query can become an endpoint
  • Consistency across shards by default
  • Scale-out native architecture
  • Unlimited joins without performance impact
  • Synchronous replication
